description: A commemorative item for Christmas, 2004

name: Star Ornament
description: An essential ingredient needed to make a Christmas Tree. Take it to a Santa trainee, and he will create a Christmas Tree for you

name: Christmas Tree
description: Summons a Christmas Tree

name: Special Christmas Tree
description: Summons a Christmas tree that will increase HP and MP regeneration. This effect is only produced if the Special Christmas Tree is summoned outside of a village

name: Ancient Adena
description: Money that is circulated only within the Lords of Dawn and Revolutionaries of Dusk. It is also used when trading with the Blacksmith of Mammon

name: Red Soul Crystal - Stage 11
description: A red crystal that absorbs souls, stage 11. Once saturated, it bestows special abilities to a weapon. Consumes 26 MP. Once a soul stone reaches this stage, it can absorb souls independently. No targeting is necessary

name: Green Soul Crystal - Stage 11
description: A green crystal that absorbs souls, stage 11. Once saturated, it bestows special abilities to a weapon. Consumes 26 MP. Once a soul stone reaches this stage, it can absorb souls independently. No targeting is necessary

description: Makes a unique sound when walking in them

description: Restores CP by 50

description: Restores CP by 200

description: Recharges SP by 500

description: Recharges SP by 5000

name: Dasparion's Staff
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nIncreases Max MP by 30%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nIncreases Max MP by 60% and decreases Max HP by 40%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Dasparion's Staff
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nIncreases Casting Spd. by 15%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP

name: Meteor Shower
description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>\\nIncreases Critical by 61. Increases damage inflicted during PvP
